extendedInfo.description: Get quotes from the Holy Bible with out latest look and feel!  New release 4.0 brings you the best bible quotations in the latest Android layout. Feel free to email us about any comments or suggestions!Not just quotes anymore!  Now get a Daily Devotional inside the app!Quotes available in English and EspaÃ±ol!Bible Quotes brings you many great verses from the bible.  Get inspired by a new quote every day.  Quotes updated often.  New features being added all the time.Added one step Facebook SharingFeatures:- LookUp is our new feature to lookup a verse in the bible. (This idea was given to us from one of our great users, Johnny Digital. Thank You!)- Save favorites- Share quotes with others through via:   SMS, Email, Twitter, Facebook, GoogleVoice, Wordpress.   (For Facebook sharing please use the "FB Share" Button)- Add quote to clipboard. (long press the quote to add it)- Add your own Bible verse.- LookUp is our latest feature to lookup a verse in the bible. (This idea was given to us from one of our great users, Johnny Digital. Thank You!)- Optimized for Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)If you would like to help us improve our apps please download our Bible Quotes (Donate) app. It is only $0.99.  It is the same application but is used as a way for you to donate.  With this money will will be able to make new features and better ways for you and others to read through amazing bible quotes.  The donation will also go to helping us build our new Online Bible Community that will be rolling out in the next few weeks! Thank You & God Bless

reviews.title: Excellent App
reviews.comment: This app is great inspiration to staying connected to your faith getting these quotes inspire me in all aspects of life through Christ Jesus
reviews.author: Terri Crosson

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I love this application! Words are so simple,easy to understand.
reviews.author: Yachi Hojo

reviews.title: BEST
reviews.comment: Very nice app, easy to navigate. The best app out there. Thanks so much.
reviews.author: Craig D

reviews.title: Bible quotes I love app Great app!!!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app so inspirational when youre on the go sometimes you need positive Bible scriptures fast !!!!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I read the bible everyday.ths app helps me know wer i stand in the word.wesome app.no regrets downloading it. Amen..jesus loves u.

reviews.title: Wonderfully Convenient
reviews.comment: I just downloaded last night and must say I am pleased thus far. How wonderful to quickly access the Word of God. Thanks to the developers of this app.

reviews.comment: excellent app  opening and finding  the word  is refreshing  inspiring

reviews.comment: I love this app. Very well organized. Put together. Easy to use an understand.

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I love the ability to share, so simple and amazing. Keep it up.

reviews.title: fantastic Messages
reviews.comment: I am a servant of God and I starting to read the Holy Bible each day. Thank you for your time out to speak the Holy messages to all humankind. May Our Heavenly Keep Blessing All of the Individuals that take time out to read the Holy Scriptures. God Bless You All!

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: The Add Quote feature should include the ability to add multiple verses. For example Luke 6:37-38

reviews.comment: Really good app, gives encouraging and relevant scriptures. Havent used it much yet but really keen on geting into it.

reviews.comment: I love the words of Jesus is right a hand. Its so soothing.

reviews.title: Matt
reviews.comment: Awsome app will help you increase in your walk with christ but you must also invest in your time with the father in order to grow spiritually. God\'s word is a weapon to fight all of Satan\'s lies and this app helps to shows you how to wield it god bless
reviews.author: Matt Bernier

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: This app is just what I needed and was looking for, I pray it helps everyone get the encouragement they want and deserve!! I thank you VERY VERY much for this GREAT 5 STAR APP!!!!! My God bless us ALL!!!!!
